Sentencas: A promising solution to the storage of intermittent renewable energy is to integrate solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOEC) with solar/wind power.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: This trend necessitates comprehensive, quantitative investigations on the transient characteristics of SOEC, especially under varying power-supply conditions.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: For this purpose, a high-resolution, 3-dimensional, transient numerical model, as well as an adaptive time-stepping strategy, is proposed in this study.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: This study analyzes the electrical, gaseous, and thermal responses of SOEC to voltage ramps with different ramp rates and ramp magnitudes.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: The results show that electrical undershoots or overshoots occur after fast voltage changes.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: This phenomenon reflects the discrepancies between the steady and transient current-voltage characteristics and may lead to unsteady hydrogen production rates in practice.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: The electrical undershoots or overshoots are caused by the different transfer rates in SOEC - electronic/ionic transfer rate is faster than mass transfer rate, and mass transfer rate is faster than heat transfer rate.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: Furthermore, the electrical undershoots or overshoots can be divided into two parts.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: One part is related to mass-transfer lag, and the other part is related to heat-transfer lag.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: The former can be alleviated or eliminated by simply slowing down the voltage ramp, while the latter needs a more effective control strategy other than merely adjusting the voltage ramps.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: Apart from the electrical conditions, cell structure also has significant impacts on the electrical responses, e.g., the rib and the length of channel are related to the non-uniform electrical responses in the functional layer.
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots

Sentencas: Finally, via a quantitative technique developed from linear time-invariant systems, it is shown that the electrical responses of SOEC are governed by two time constants in the functional layer, namely the mass-transfer time constant (estimated as m,H2O,FL = 0.00723 s) and the heat-transfer time constant (estimated as t,FL= 180 s).
Titulo: Transient characteristics of a solid oxide electrolysis cell under different voltage ramps: Transport phenomena behind overshoots
